title: FT: T206 SGC 60 MADDOX for T206 low grade beaters!
author: Craig M

posts.post_title: FT: T206 SGC 60 MADDOX for T206 low grade beaters!
posts.post_content:
I have upgraded my T206 SGC 60 MADDOX so I would like to trade him away for a group of T206 ""RAW"" lower grade beaters.

I am just starting to build a low grade set; I am going for quantity instead of quality right now.

Any action?

Craig
